question_text: Which of the following are valid steps when replacing a single key on a laptop? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Identify the keycap type used by the laptop
Follow manufacturer guidance for key replacement
Forcefully pry up the plastic hinge
correct_answer: Identify the keycap type used by the laptop
Follow manufacturer guidance for key replacement
explanation: Key repair involves careful handling of the keycap, hinge, and clips, and following device-specific instructions.
